::DarkMouse::

She took his hand and stood up.  She put the rat on her shoulder.
She looked at Scorponok.  She realy didn't want to go back, but she 
felt like she had no choice. 
"I will follow you commander."
She wondered was he really doing this just to have an underling to 
command or did he even care about her.  She remembered him loving her 
once, for what seamed like an eternity ago.  She remembered him 
calling her love and dear while he was walking past her in the forest 
looking for her. But now thowe words seamed empty.
"I will follow you back to the base commaner." she said in a soft 
voice.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, crow_lord@h... wrote:
> Scopronok
> 
> 
> Scorponok answered Darkmouse's 'why' "Because, Megatron needs every 
> soilder he can get, and without you, who would build our bases. 
Well 
> do you want to go back to the base." Scopronok put out a hand to 
help 
> her up.
